posts.post_text: My latest song, Always Yours, is out and hope you've had a chance to listen! Check it out if you haven't already.
This Friday my new EP, Always Yours, is coming out. AAAAAND I'll also be releasing an official video for the song Always Yours on Friday.

Happy (checks calendar) Monday everyone. I'm releasing a new EP on Friday. It's got acoustic versions of songs from my album and a brand new song on there. Hopefully this gives you something fun to look forward to this week.

The acoustic version of Where The Shadow Ends is out now. Give it a listen! I don't know where the actual shadow ends but I hope it involves getting to go outside when it does. http://banners.lnk.to/WTSEacoustic
Good morning everyone. What's the plan for today? Just being good and staying inside because that's how to really look after each other? Ok cool.

Just me and my gross couch getting our self isolate on. We are all so profoundly in this together so I'm sending all my love to all of you. Ill reply to all the comments here so if you're bored or lonely give me a shout and let's have a chat.

The video to someone to you just hit 20 million. That's exactly 20 million more listens than I honestly thought I'd get when I started writing songs. So thankyou for everything so far everyone. I completely love you all.

post_comments.comment_text: Hey, you, you deserve it. This song, has so much to it, deep meaning, perfect vocals, incredible music and those lyrics, damn! You deserve the views and recognition. You're so, so underrated. Congratulations!🎉🎊
Well deserved! Your songs are amazing.

posts.post_text: I'm just not glamorous enough for this am I? Pre-show warm up in front of surely the smallest kettle possible and open boxes of Splenda and bin bags. My boy Mack looks like he's having a rare old time though so that's something. He's probably just popped the tiny kettle on.

post_comments.comment_text: I think the kettle is having the time of its life though.....😂🙏
That looks hella fun. Hope you're having a great time.

Splenda by BANNΞRS

2020 Sugar records™

XD
Just discovered you guys recently and some body to you is on repeat!
Come to Houston and I'll be there

posts.post_text: Ah I love my friends, me. I really do. Look at them! Magnificent. I really should tell them.

post_comments.comment_text: You are amazing and i love your music!
I love your music but its sad that you are not too popular :.....(
Your music makes me smile everytime you have a lot of talent please keep blessing us with your music

I'm from Algeria and I really love your music 😍
You are such an amazing person! Thank you so much. Your music is so inspiring!

posts.post_text: If you take nothing else away from this picture please look at how low this pipe is. Why is there such a low pipe happening in this day and age? It's a jungle out there. Look after yourselves.

posts.post_text: Happy Friday everyone. Here's a picture of my skinny legs to celebrate. Look after each other and have a boss weekend please.

post_comments.comment_text: Dude, you look like a lady killer to me.😀

posts.post_text: I usually play piano through headphones and sing nonsense to try out melodies and I can only imagine it sounds absolutely mad if you live on my floor. So to the inhabitants of the 14th floor and possibly 15 and 13, as usual, I'm so so sorry.

post_comments.comment_text: Thank you your music has helped me get through tough times and I hope to one day attend a concert of your band

I think whoever has you as their neighbor must love your nonsense cuz you’re an incredibly talented singer 💙
Thank you so much for all the good work
If it's piano ... then it's okay !
Keep things going man! Love your music
I would rather have you as my  neighbor than my actual neighbors! Hope to see you live in the near future :) xx love from France
Your music is so awesome and inspiring!!
Whatever gets the creative juices flowing is what I say. I draw my graphic novels in long johns and big fuzzy socks. Your music touches the soul.🙂

posts.post_text: Heeeeeeyyyy!! How's it going everyone? I haven't checked in on you for a bit. How was Christmas and new year and all that? I'm dead excited for this year, me. I think it's gonna be really good.

post_comments.comment_text: Literally listening to your music right when I found this 😂 have a great 2020 man

Hi :) Happy New year to you! 
Im from Budapest, Hungary :) Planning to play here?

Man... your style is soooooo unique pls keep it up😭🙏...

I wish you all the best for the coming year! Kisses from France!

posts.post_text: I've had the best time travelling across America with my pals and singing with you guys. Thank you all so much for coming to see us play. You're the absolute best.

post_comments.comment_text: PS. I think yall should write an new original  Christmas song focused on representing families and friends the ups and downs and of course the spirit of christmas. JUST SOME FOOD FOR THOUGHT😎

I love you guys. 
The other week my brother came to visit, and all our lives we've had NOTHING in common. But we got talking about bands we liked and he asked if I knew Banners and suddenly for the first time in years we talking about something both of us liked! It wasn't much but it sure helped break the ice for the rest of the week and we dad other fun stuff too. So thanks for being awesome. A little ripple goes a long ways so thanks for your impact on your listeners lives
You all are the best, our family can’t stop listening to your music!❤️
Your new album is too good thnx for the great music❤
Amazing! Are doing some gigs in Europe some time soon?
Im jealous... I wish i could time travel across the USA. Lucky
I don't care about America. I need you in Austria
Love yalls  music keep up the great work and have fun
Will you come to Mexico soon? :'(
You guys were amazing to watch live! My friends and I had so much fun.
I wish you all could come to Northern Ireland -Belfast I really loves your music and I wanna see yous live 😍😍😍😍😜😊😁😁😁😉
These pictures are everything. You are so passionate with your music. So happy I got to see you on this tour. Your album is amazing!
Would love to see you perform in Jakarta
Great show in Phoenix last night, thanks for making us part of your tour.

posts.post_text: "Where The Shadow Ends” featuring Young Bombs is here. It's a song that's been around for a little while and I love it so much. I'm so happy you can finally hear it. Oh and I'm releasing a whole album on October 4th. AN ALBUM! REALLY REALLY SOON! AAAAAARRRGGGHHH!!!!

post_comments.comment_text: I've been wondering when your next album would come! Can't wait

posts.post_text: ‪Good morning everyone! I've got a day off today and I'm doing ABSOLUTELY NOTHING!! Have a completely boss week and then at the end of it feel free to listen to my new album that comes out on Friday. Love you all. This mega pic is by Samantha Monendo‬

post_comments.comment_text: You are the greatest and I really wished I could have been able to be at your concert. Cheers mate.

https://islandrecs.lnk.to/WhereTheSha...

posts.post_text: Oof! I just noticed you absolute super champs have watched the acoustic version of got it in you 10 Million times. Thanks everyone. Let's all have a great big internet hug. If any of you guys have a YouTube video up I'll watch that 10 million times too. Seems only right.

it has such a great message. why wouldn’t we watch it 10 million times?

posts.post_text: On Spotify you can see where people are listening to your music and i've never really spent time with it until now. I just want to say that I appreciate you all. It can feel like a mad world but we're all far more connected than some would have you believe. Love you all.
